professional_summary: Experienced Oracle Database Administrator with expertise in RAC environments, performance tuning, and database management across various platforms.

key_responsibilities: Upgraded and maintained Oracle databases to improve performance and efficiency.
Implemented RAC (Real Application Clusters) and ASM (Automatic Storage Management) for high-availability solutions.
Administered backup and recovery processes using RMAN to ensure data integrity.
Installed and configured Oracle applications in complex environments.
Applied software patches to maintain system integrity.
Cloned database instances using RMAN Duplicate for disaster recovery purposes.

technical_skills:
Oracle Database Administration",
            "RAC (Real Application Clusters) Management",
            "Database Performance Tuning",
            "SQL*Plus Programming",
            "RMAN (Oracle Recovery Manager)",
            "ASM (Automatic Storage Management)
tools_and_software:
RMAN",
            "OEM (Enterprise Manager)",
            "Erwin (Reverse Engineering Tool)",
            "Datapump",
            "Opatch",
            "Flashback Database",
            "Golden Gate",
